newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore rubber market closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Singapore rubber market closed for holiday.

text.p: The Singapore rubber market was closed on Thursday for a holiday. The market will reopen on Friday.
The market closed on a weak note on Wednesday with most players having left for an industry dinner in the Thai rubber centre of Hat Yai on Friday, dealers said.

The June RSS3 finished on Wednesday at 106.75 U.S. cents a kg from 107.25 cents. October/December RSS1 settled at 157.50 Singapore cents (US$1.09) a kg from 158.50 cents. January/March TSR20 ended at 105.75 U.S. cents a kg from 107.75 cents. -- (US$1-S$1.44) Rene Pastor (65-8703305)
